remarks: Lemma for ~ mapdpg .  Existence part - consolidate hypotheses in ~ mapdpglem23 .  (Contributed by NM, 21-Mar-2015.)
statement:
mapdpg.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
mapdpg.m $e |- M = ( ( mapd ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdpg.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdpg.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
mapdpg.s $e |- .- = ( -g ` U ) $.
mapdpg.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.
mapdpg.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` U ) $.
mapdpg.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdpg.f $e |- F = ( Base ` C ) $.
mapdpg.r $e |- R = ( -g ` C ) $.
mapdpg.j $e |- J = ( LSpan ` C ) $.
mapdpg.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
mapdpg.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
mapdpg.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
mapdpg.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
mapdpg.ne $e |- ( ph -> ( N ` { X } ) =/= ( N ` { Y } ) ) $.
mapdpg.e $e |- ( ph -> ( M ` ( N ` { X } ) ) = ( J ` { G } ) ) $.
mapdpglem24 $p |- ( ph -> E. h e. F ( ( M ` ( N ` { Y } ) ) = ( J ` { h } ) /\ ( M ` ( N ` { ( X .- Y ) } ) ) = ( J ` { ( G R h ) } ) ) ) $.
$d .- h $.
